content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Tharman Shanmugaratnam

This is a list of international presidential trips made by Tharman Shanmugaratnam, the 9th President of Singapore.
President Tharman Shanmugaratnam, who took the office of President of Singapore on 14 September 2023, made his first overseas presidential state visit to meet with his counter-part Sultan of Brunei, Hassanal Bolkiah on 25 January 2024 at Bandar Seri Begawan. While he made his first working visit overseas as president to New York City on 27 November 2023. As of October 2025, he has made 17 Presidential Trips to 14 countries during his presidency.
Tharman is currently chair of the Board of Trustees of the Group of Thirty (G30), co-chair of the Global Commission on the Economics of Water (GCEW), co-chair of the High-Level Advisory Council on Jobs and a member of the Board of Trustees of the World Economic Forum (WEF).
Summary
The number of visits per country where President Tharman traveled are:
* One: Belgium, Brunei, Estonia, Egypt, India, Italy, Luxembourg, Malaysia,  Philippines, Vatican City, Germany
* Two: France
* Four: Switzerland, United States

|Davos  Zurich
|16–21 January
|Working visit to Switzerland as president.
|-

|Bandar Seri Begawan
|24–26 January
|State Visit to Brunei as president, first State Visit overseas.
|-
|rowspan="4" |4
|
|Rome
|20–24 June
|Working visit to Rome. President Tharman was hosted to an official lunch by President Mattarella.
|-
|
|Vatican City
|22 June
|Private audience with Pope Francis.
|-
|
|Helsinki
|25 June
|Transiting at Helsinki to Estonia, hosted to breakfast by Finnish President Alexander Stubb
|-
|
|Tallinn
|25–26 June
|Official visit to Estonia. Tharman received a ceremonial welcome and met President Alar Karis, Prime Minister of Estonia Kaja Kallas, and President of the Riigikogu Lauri Hussar.
|-
|rowspan="1”|5
|
|Paris
|24-28 July
|Visited Paris, France from 24 to 28 July 2024 for the XXXIII Summer Olympic Games.
|-
|rowspan="1”|6
|
|Manila
|15-17 August
|State Visit to the Philippines.
|-
|rowspan="2”|7
|
|Geneva
|20-22 August
|President Tharman visited Geneva, Switzerland from 20 to 22 August 2024
|-
|
|Paris
|23 August
|President Tharman visited Paris, France on 23 August 2024. He met and gave support to the Singapore athletes participating in the Paralympic Games.
|-
|rowspan="1”|8
|
|Washington, D.C.
|22-25 October
|Working visit to United States as Co-Chair of the World Bank Group’s High-Level Advisory Council on Jobs and Global Commission on the Economics of Water.
|-
|}
